Articles.Content:
So guys, playing with industrial craft, a minecraft mod and I have a few questions about how electricity works.

Basically if you split the power and sent it to a transformer with a higher output what would the output be? 128 on a higher voltage or 64 on the same voltage?

EDIT: Sorry for the lack of detail I am kinda in a rush to get ready for work but wanted to get this posted in the hope of having some replies when I get off work in a few hours.

Edited November 27, 2014 by 7499275
